[{"content":"

While investors mull Twitter's true assets ahead of the company going public, the services of two other tech companies recently came under scrutiny with the help of a professor at Yale University. Those commercials you may have seen surveying users who seem to prefer Bing to Google? Their results might be a little skewed. Will Oremus of Slate Magazine explains.

","type":"text/html"}]
description: Microsoft's claim that users prefer its search engine Bing over Google is dubious.
title: 'Bing it on'? Not so fast...
teaser: Microsoft's claim that users prefer its search engine Bing over Google is dubious.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, October 7, 2013
contentencoded: While investors mull Twitter's true assets ahead of the company going public, the services of two other tech companies recently came under scrutiny with the help of a professor at Yale University. Those commercials you may have seen surveying users who seem to prefer Bing to Google? Their results might be a little skewed. Will Oremus of Slate Magazine explains.
